report.title: UKBMS Sample Download Report
report.description: Lists saved samples. Normally invoked from download bar on annual summary page.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Enter a bracket enclosed, comma separated list of location IDs

table.where: #this#.deleted = FALSE and #this#.parent_id IS NULL and #this#.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ('#user_id#'='' OR CAST(#this#.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#') AND #this#.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date) AND #this#.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)

report.table:
